Description:
------------
Play as Josh Lewsey, Georg's Murphy, Shane Williams and Chris Paterson in this realistic game of rugby! For the first time in many years the northern hemisphere rugby nations are on equal billing with their Southern Hemisphere counterparts and competition for the highest position that has never been so close, even with the small fish on the international scene that comes with the results of shock. Rugby Union has never been so competitive or so popular, even at club level. Rugby Challenge will delight gamers with its immersive gameplay and easy to understand manipulation. Comment by John Inverdale and Dewi Morris.
